articles.title: Komodo Dragons’ Iron Teeth: A New Discovery in Reptilian Predation - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
articles.description: A groundbreaking study has revealed that Komodo dragons, the largest living lizards, possess a unique adaptation in their teeth: a concentrated layer of iron.
articles.content:

articles.title: Why we might never know the truth about ultra-processed foods - BBC.com
articles.description: Experts can’t agree how exactly they affect us and it’s not clear that science will give us an answer.
articles.content:
They are the bête noire of many nutritionists - mass-produced yet moreish foods like chicken nuggets, packaged snacks, fizzy drinks, ice cream or even sliced brown bread.
